name: BigBang Pongs
description:
BigBang Pongs is a wonderful casual puzzle game for people who want to kill time, reduce pressure and train brain.

On a summer seaside beach, click on adjacent candy blocks, the blocks of the same color will be eliminated and rewarded with gems. The relaxing soundtrack and beautiful graphics make every move a delight.

Features:
● Super addictive PopStar gameplay!
● Make the Combo to get higher score
● Collect more GEMS to redeem the Tools!
● No Time limite. Plan before you move!
● Use the Hammer Tool to clear selected block
● Use the Reset Tool to swap the blocks
● Use the Color Tool to change the block color
● Use the Lighting Tool to destroy some blocks

Download this new popstar puzzle game to enjoy the endless fun!
